trans-unit.source: Presents the packet information from a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom*> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom*>.
trans-unit.target: 呈現從呼叫的封包資訊<> *> 或<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom*> method or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom*> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得呼叫的結果已收到的封包的來源資訊<> *> 方法或<> *> 方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> that indicates the origin information of the packet that was received as a result of calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom*> method or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>，指出呼叫的結果已收到的封包的來源資訊<> *> 方法或<> *> 方法。</xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: For packets that were sent from a unicast address, the Address property will return the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> of the sender; for multicast or broadcast packets, the Address property will return the multicast or broadcast <xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.
trans-unit.target: 從單點傳播位址送出的封包，位址屬性將傳回<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>寄件者; 針對多點傳送或廣播封包位址屬性會傳回多點傳送或廣播<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>.</xref:System.Net.IPAddress> </xref:System.Net.IPAddress>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出這個執行個體是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 要與這個執行個體比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: if comparand is an instance of and equals the value of the instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 comparand 的執行個體等於執行個體的值，否則 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code is constructed from the values of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊程式碼建構的值從<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A>

trans-unit.source: An Int32 hash code.
trans-unit.target: Int32 雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the network interface information that is associated with a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ReceiveMessageFrom*> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.EndReceiveMessageFrom*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得呼叫相關聯的網路介面資訊<> *> 或<> *>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> value, which represents the index of the network interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>值，表示網路介面的索引。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: You can use this index with <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces*> to get more information about the relevant interface.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此索引<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces*>來取得相關的介面的詳細資訊。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces*>

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref> instances are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否兩個指定<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref>執行個體相等。

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子會測試兩者<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A>這兩個引數的值。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref> instance that is to the left of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"> </xref>等號比較運算子左邊的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref> instance that is to the right of the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"> </xref>等號比較運算子右邊的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: if packetInformation1 and packetInformation2 are equal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if packetInformation1 and packetInformation2 are equal; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Tests whether two specified <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref> instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: 測試是否兩個指定<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref>執行個體是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: This operator tests both the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> values for both arguments.
trans-unit.target: 這個運算子會測試兩者<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A>這兩個引數的值。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Interface%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation.Address%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref> instance that is to the left of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"> </xref>不等比較運算子左邊的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"></xref> instance that is to the right of the inequality operator.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.IPPacketInformation"> </xref>不等比較運算子右邊的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: if packetInformation1 and packetInformation2 are unequal; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if packetInformation1 and packetInformation2 are unequal; otherwise, .
